description: A playful twist on a snake's length in a pun.
title: Snake's Arrival
n_1: Sam inquires about the arrival of a little snake to Liz.
c2_1: Not sure, but it won’t be long.
n_2: Sam looks puzzled, pondering the response.
n_3: Realization dawns on Sam, and he chuckles.
n_4: They both laugh, enjoying the wordplay.
